tags.description: Broad sand beach. Camping on beach at forest margin. Fine sand, attractive. View. Buggy.
tags.name: Campania Island west (BCMT)

tags.description: All-tide landing on beach in narrow protected cove. Rock below, broken shell above. Small tent clearing in upland. Reported to be buggy. Assume adequate space for additional tents if brushed. Hammock opportunities. Year-round water at cove head in creek.
tags.name: Squally Channel (BCMT)

tags.description: Broad white sand beach. Beach sites or upland forest clearings just above beach. Water at creek at N end of beach to S or in next cove. Fine sand, attractive. View. Beach to S has start of rough hiking trail/route to Mt. Pender. Buggy.
tags.name: Campania Island central (BCMT)

tags.description: Broad white sand beach. Low gradient. Beach camping on all but the highest tides. No upland tent sites found 2022. Attractive. Water at creek at N end of beach. Popular, favoured site. Buggy. Rough access to upland hiking.
tags.name: Campania Mount Pender (BCMT)
